title: open Thunderbird download

creator: ken.mccallum147

title: Local Folders structure intact, sbd and msf present, but Thunderbird displays no messages
content:
Hello

I created an Archive directory within Local Folders, and within that have stored years of emails.

As of yesterday, when clicking on any given sub directory within the Archive, Thunderbird says that there are 0 messages to display.

All of the .sbd and .msf files are present when I browse the Archive structure in my user profile in Windows Explorer.

The problem seems to be that Thunderbird can read and display the directory structure, but cannot display the emails contained within it.

I do not have a backup of the profile directory (yes, I know!).

Can anyone offer a solution that will allow Thunderbird to display messages that seem still be present ?

With thanks in advance
creator: am45

title: Archiving emails
content: I'm currently using Thunderbird 115.7.0 (64 bit) portable version on Windows 10. For many years I have ordered my emails by using subfolders, with a large one called 'Archives'. When another folder such as 'EE' becomes non-current I simply drag and drop it to the 'Archives' folder. However now the archives folder is so large and irrelevant that when searching for emails, I get thousands of results from up to 15 years ago. So, how can I archive emails so that they are easily accessible, but so they don't come up in an all encompassing "All folders" search?
creator: addyjustforregistering

title: DOWNLOAD FILE .PDF
content:
Buongiorno, ultimamente mi è impossibile aprire i file .pdf che ricevo via mail e scarico utilizzando Thunderbird, perchè una volta scaricati, quando cerco di aprirli non riesco perchè mi compare una finestra che avvisa che il file è danneggiato. Lo stesso file però, scaricato direttamente dalla posta online si apre senza alcun problema. Come posso risolvere?

Grazie. Buon lavoro M.C.
creator: cermarica

title: Emails wont didplay and have gone missing
content: I moved some emails to a folder from the inbox and now they are not displaying. when I search them I am able to find them and can be read, the search indicates that they are in "the new folder" all mail and important. This has happened before and I have not been able to resolve I am assuming there must be a setting I have activated/deactivated but I've no idea what. I am FAR from tech savvy so please give any answers in as simplistic form as possible. Thanks Matt

title: Üçüncü parti uygulama
content:
Merhabalar sistemimizde kullanmış olduğumuz program ile thunderbird entegreli bir şekilde çalışmamaktadır. Kurumumuzda ki diğer bilgisayarlarda problem yaşamamaktayız. Ancak yeni bilgisayarımızda entegrasyon sağlanamamaktadır. Kullandığımız programda müşterilere mail atmak istediğimiz zaman otomatik olarak bana yeni bir mail penceresi açması gerekmekte ancak şu an hiçbir şekilde mail penceresini açmamaktadır.

Desteğinizi rica edeirm
creator: mertugurlutan1

title: Thunderbird - SMTP spojení ztraceno
content:
Dobrý den,

prosím o radu, máme problém s Thunderbird a odesláním mailu SMTP serverem, nastavení podle poskytovatele www.webhosting-c4.cz/nastaveni-sluzeb a na jejich doporučení použitý port 12345, kvůli spamu ze zahraničí.

Chyba je: Zprávu se nepodařilo odeslat, protože spojení se SMTP serverem smtp.domena.cz bylo ztraceno uprostřed transakce.

Problém je jen ze zahraničí, z ČR vše funguje. Za mě se spojení naváže, ale je nestabilní.

Udělal jsem test přes ping na doménu, proběhl bez problému ping mail.domena.cz, zde je jen větší odezva.

Antivir je Windows Defender, vypl jsem kontrolu v reálném čase a nic, přidal jsem výjimku Thunderbirdu do firewallu pro veřejné sítě a také nic.

Děkuji za případné rady, kam se zaměřit.
creator: reklamyhoby

title: oauth2
content:
Microsoft tell me that I must use OAuth2 for my accounts, else I'll be locked out.

Server is imap-mail.outlook.com. If I select OAuth2, then I can't receive emails unless I reset back to Normal Password.

I'm also supposed to set my SMTP server (smtp-mail.outlook.com) to OAuth2, but this isn't an option on the drop down list.

Help, please!

title: mailbox selected READ-ONLY
content:
Hello, In my work email account (Zimbra instance), very regularly new emails keep reappearing as unread even after they are marked as read. If I restart Thunderbird, or if I go offline then online again the problem is solved; however, I would like a more definitive solution.

When the problem occurs, in the console I can see "The current operation on 'Inbox' did not succeed. The mail server for account X responded: mailbox selected READ-ONLY.". I tried solution suggest at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1276757, i.e., setting `mail.server.default.send_client_info` to `false`, but it did not work. Any other suggestion?
creator: maaaaaaaaartin

title: contacten
content: Hi Ik heb een mail adress bij telenet.be Op windows 11, linux mint 21.3 gebruik ik thunderbird als mail programma. In thunderbird staat opslaan van gemailde contacten uitgeschakeld. Mail programma op android is bluemail. Het is in bluemazail dat ik niet weet waarom hij de contacten daar opslaat. Bv ik mail via thunderbird bv naar info@mijn.be. In thunderbird word dit gemaild contact niet bewaard. Op mijn webmail van telenet.be zie ik het contact ook niet staan. Maar in blue mail zie ik bij concacten het gemailde contact wel staan. Hoe komt dat?

title: why does my hotmail in thunderbird sometimes get my emails and other times it says authentication failed?
content: why does my hotmail in thunderbird sometimes get my emails and other times it says "Sending of password for user *********@hotmail.com did not succeed. Mail server pop-mail.outlook.com responded: Authentication failure: unknown user name or bad password"? Then it starts getting them again. It's totally random. Every once in a while it does it with my .live email too. Yet other .live and .hotmail addresses never have a problem? TIA

title: Mailserver outlook.office365.com antwoordde: Server Unavailable. 21

title: selecting messages on message pane
content: to select two or more messages on the message pane, one method is to hold down the CTRL key and left click on the messages you want to select. This has stopped working on my Thunderbird. When I select a message and then go on to select the next message, the first message I selected is deselected. So I can only select one message for an operation, e.g. "move", "delete", rather than a group of messages.

title: How do I remove a redundant second identity appearance?
content: It must have been one of those nutty "...something I did" things that made a second account identity appear one day. I must be missing a step. I have attached a screen shot.

Thank you for your help.
